bool commited
StringList headersList

Detailed Description

HTTP Header Container all headers are contained in HttpHeader::commited member variable and latter sent to the browser by invoking HttpHeader::commit() member function

Author:
Neel Basu <neel>

void HttpHeader::addHeader ( const string &  key,
const string &  val 
)

Add's a header while the header argument is passed as key, value format e.g. with two arguments they are concated with a ':' character and stored into headers Vector

References headersList.

void HttpHeader::commit (  ) 

Commit's HTTP Headers as headers are ultimately stored as "Key: Value" strign in the vector. it just implodes it by a \n and prints it to cout

References commited, and headersList.
